translations: n.乱语；快速而不清楚的言语

phrs.translation: 尤用数据, 乱语, 无用数据, 无意义数据
检验总计, 数位和, 翻译, 数位总和
乱语静心, 乱语的静心
胡言乱语, 莫名其妙的话, 急促而不清楚的话

sentences.sentence: When he was talking to a girl he could hardly speak, and when he did speak he talked gibberish.
sentences.translation: 跟女孩讲话时，他几乎说不出来，好不容易说出来了，又都是些胡言乱语。

sentences.sentence: The robin thought he spoke this gibberish to them because they were not intelligent enough to understand feathered speech.
sentences.translation: 知更鸟认为他对他们胡言乱语，因为他们不够聪明，听不懂鸟类的语言。

sentences.sentence: You were talking gibberish in your sleep.
